name: Emerald Grove
description: Luminous forest canopies where Kweebecs tend living woodcraft.

name: Gale Cliffs
description: Wind-carved mesas that collect Skysong resonance and static storms.

name: Stormguard Keep
description: The last bastion of humanity, battered by endless tempests.

name: Sunset Dunes
description: Searing dunes and hidden oases patrolled by Desert Scavenger caravans.

name: Shadow Depths
description: A cavernous underworld of corrupted flora and lurking horrors.

name: Frostblossom Glacier
description: A frozen expanse where crystalline flowers channel aurora energy.

name: Azure Cove
description: Shimmering tide pools where coral songs hum beneath the waves.

name: Tidal Reach
description: Mangrove channels where the tide carves winding trade routes.

name: Coral Gardens
description: Sunlit reefs where Skysong stewards study tidal harmonics.

name: Obsidian Wastes
description: Glass-scarred badlands where lava rivers cool into brittle blades.

name: Emberfen Bog
description: Smoldering wetlands where fireflies and flame-kissed reeds mingle.

name: Crystal Meadows
description: Rolling fields of prism grass that refract dusk into rainbows.

name: Thunder Peaks
description: High crags where storms coil around ancient lightning towers.

name: Stormlash Ridge
description: Jagged ridgelines anchored by ancient storm beacons.

name: Veilwood Marsh
description: Fog-draped groves where specters dance among lantern trees.

name: Gloamroot Hollow
description: Sapped caverns where bioluminescent roots weave a twilight canopy.

name: Moonlit Grove
description: Silvered clearings where ancient sprites celebrate nightfall.

name: Mistspire Vale
description: Cloud-piercing towers where Skysong sages track constellations.

name: Runic Highlands
description: Plateaus etched with ancient glyphs that hum with latent power.

name: Starfall Fields
description: Rolling tundra glittering with meteor shards and aurora snow.

name: Aurora Steppe
description: Polar plains suffused with dancing lights and icy gusts.

name: Tempest Fjords
description: Cliffside waterways where storms collide with ocean squalls.

name: Ironroot Range
description: Ancient mountains where titanic trees punch through the stone.

name: Echoing Chasm
description: Hollow ravines where every sound births shimmering illusions.

name: Scarlet Bog
description: Crimson marshes where fungal blooms pulse with emberlight.

name: Ashen Desolation
description: Charred plains smoldering under a sky of drifting soot.

name: Twilight Sands
description: Dunes that glow at dusk, guiding caravans to hidden sanctums.

name: Duskfall Wetlands
description: Tide-fed marshes where lantern eels weave through reeds.

name: Coral Glow Shoal
description: Bioluminescent shallows shimmering with reef magic.

name: Shiverwind Coast
description: Icy shoreline battered by polar gales and drifting bergs.

name: Basalt Barrens
description: Weathered volcanic flats criss-crossed by molten veins.

name: Sunforge Badlands
description: Scorched mesas where wandering smiths tame molten rivers.

name: Emberpeak Crater
description: A blazing caldera filled with emberglass spines and slag flows.

name: Tempest Harbor
description: A storm-lashed harbor watched by privateers and siren buoys.

name: Ironroot Heart
description: The ancient core of the Ironroot range where trees fuse with stone.

name: Runic Wilds
description: Untamed plateaus pulsing with glyphlight and ancient energy.

name: Mistspire Citadel
description: High towers above the clouds guarded by Skywatch sentinels.

name: Moonshadow Thicket
description: Dense understory alight with moonfire wisps and silent sprites.

name: Sunglade Terrace
description: Terraced orchards where sunblossoms shimmer like gold.

name: Wildvine Glade
description: Verdant clearings tangled with fast-growing wildvines.

name: Silkwood Vale
description: Soft-lit groves where silkspinners weave between towering birches.

name: Everfrost Tundra
description: Endless ice fields dotted with aurora-pillars and mammoth herds.

name: Glimmering Wastes
description: Mirage-strewn flats where crystals erupt from shifting sands.

name: Horizon Steppe
description: Golden plains swept by warm winds and horizon-hunting riders.

name: Skysong Spires
description: Floating towers humming with resonance and wardlight.

name: Ashen Reach
description: Cinder-laden beachfront where lava meets churning sea.

name: Emberglow Cavern
description: Subterranean chambers lit by emberglass veins and steam vents.

name: Voidscar Abyss
description: A yawning rupture where void energy seeps into the world.

name: Radiant Basin
description: A luminous basin fed by crystal falls and stormlight streams.

name: Dreadroot Swamp
description: A fetid marsh where twisted roots whisper long-forgotten curses.

name: Silverfin Depths
description: Submerged caverns where bioluminescent fins weave shimmering trails.

name: Bluehaven Lagoon
description: Crystal-clear lagoon with tidal markets and coral vaults.

name: Sunspire Savanna
description: Sun-baked savannas dotted with towering sunspire trees.

name: Stormbreak Isles
description: Chain of isles defended by warded breakers and lightning harpoons.

name: Crimson Mire
description: Blood-tinged bogs where fungal lanterns burn under scarlet fog.

name: Stonebark Highlands
description: High ridges where mineral-rich bark is harvested by druids.

name: Auric Dunes
description: Sun-gilded dunes that hide auric veins beneath desert winds.

name: Shattered Moors
description: Broken marshland crackling with unstable runic shards.

name: Opaline Fields
description: Pastel meadows where opaline seeds float like lanterns.

name: Dawnwatch Cliffs
description: Wind-carved cliffs where dawnwatch eagles patrol the skies.

name: Starward Valley
description: A high valley where falling stars seed fields with radiant essence.

name: Skybreaker Bastion
description: A floating fortress anchored by storm chains and lightning pylons.

name: Emberlost Foundry
description: Collapsed forges where ember spirits linger among slagworks.

name: Gilded Courtyard
description: Sunlit terraces where goldleaf vines entwine ancient colonnades.

name: Stormveil Ridge
description: Fog-shrouded ridges where stormveil feathers drift on the wind.

name: Hollowroot Cavern
description: Deep root networks hollowed into chambers of echoing sap-light.

name: Sablemarsh
description: Pitch-black peat bog where sablemoss lamps flicker over still water.

name: Sunshadow Steppe
description: Dappled plains caught between blazing sun and drifting nightshade.

name: Crystal Veil
description: A glacial veil where prismatic shards float in perpetual snowfall.

name: Abyssal Gulf
description: A plunging sea trench where abyssal currents churn with voidlight.

name: Luminous Archives
description: Floating libraries of crystal shelves orbiting a radiant core of lore.

name: Ashen Rift
description: A volcanic chasm split by lava falls and obsidian bridges.

name: Verdant Moors
description: Mist-laden wetlands stitched with luminous reeds and deep peat.

name: Glimmerfen Delta
description: Delta channels glowing with alchemical blooms and tide-moss barges.

name: Celestial Escarpment
description: Clifftop terraces crowned with astrolabes and starlit observatories.

name: Runebound Hollows
description: Sunken caverns etched with runic pillars and echoing wards.

name: Howling Peaks
description: Splintered mountain ridges lashed by endless tempests and skyship patrols.

name: Ember Depths
description: Smoldering caverns carved by magma rivers and guarded by ancient titans.

name: Gloomwild Thicket
description: Twilight-drenched wilds where fey shadows and glowing flora intermingle.

name: Howling Sands
description: A vast desert environment featuring large sand temples and savannahs. The wind element dominates this harsh landscape.

name: Dune Sepulcher
description: Ancient burial grounds hidden beneath shifting sands, guarded by restless spirits.

name: Wind Temple
description: A towering temple dedicated to the wind element, where powerful storms gather.

name: Sandstorm Plains
description: Endless plains where constant sandstorms rage, hiding ancient secrets.

name: Crystal Meadows
description: Lush meadows filled with crystalline formations that glow with inner light. A peaceful zone 1 biome.

name: Azure Cove
description: A tranquil cove where azure waters meet emerald shores. Perfect for fishing and gathering coastal resources.

name: Emberfen Bog
description: A murky bog where ember-like fungi glow in the darkness. Dangerous but resource-rich.

name: Ancient Ruins
description: Crumbling ruins of an ancient civilization. Filled with secrets and guarded by constructs.

name: Oasis Springs
description: A rare oasis in the desert where life flourishes around crystal-clear springs. A zone 2 biome connecting to zone 1.

name: Mirage Canyon
description: A deep canyon where mirages dance in the heat. Hidden treasures and dangerous creatures await.
